name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of expertise in **TypeScript**, **React**, and **React Native** focused on creating high-performance applications with secure authentication features, including **WebAuthn** and **passkeys**. Proven ability in cross-platform development and crafting user-centric experiences (UX) that align with fintech standards. I am proficient in clean architecture principles and performance optimization techniques, ensuring applications are scalable and efficient.

My background includes leading teams to develop secure, enterprise-grade solutions, leveraging skills in cloud platforms including **Azure** and **AWS**. I have a solid track record of documenting processes and enhancing collaboration among stakeholders. My strengths extend to building applications that not only meet compliance standards like HIPAA but also incorporate elements of modern development such as CI/CD automation and microservices architecture.
